lumidrage
About me
My name is lumidrage.
It could be interpreted two ways: lumid rage, and lumi drage.
Lumi means light in Latin, and drage means dragon in Norwegian.
Lumid rage is just a nickname.
Interests
I mess around with graphics programming, game dev, game engine stuff, and the occasional compiler project. Mostly living in C++ land, with Vulkan as my graphics API of choice.

I compose music every now and then.
Not great at it though.

Recently found interest in making art.
